name: Math Toolbox
body:
### The Calculator of the Future!
This is a new Java Application by ThexXTURBOXx (Nico).
It calculates things like quadratic equations, Pythagoras, etc.
Support for simple Physics and Chemistry is planned.

### Authors and Contributors
ThexXTURBOXx alone:
 - 16 years old
 - German
 - 11th grade, will study Computer Science and Maths (maybe as teaching profession)

### I found a bug / I want to help you
Just create a [new Issue here](https://github.com/ThexXTURBOXx/Math-Toolbox/issues/new).
If you already know how to fix it, then create a [new Pull Request here](https://github.com/ThexXTURBOXx/Math-Toolbox/compare).
If you just want to translate this to another language, then follow the instructions in the [README](https://github.com/ThexXTURBOXx/Math-Toolbox/blob/master/README.md).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
